title: Datafile Status / Veri Dosyası Durumu
description: Monitors the status of all database datafiles, including size, available space, and online/offline status to detect storage issues

queries.sql: SELECT FILE#, NAME, STATUS, BYTES, BLOCKS, CREATE_TIME FROM V$DATAFILE ORDER BY FILE#

doc_hint: All datafiles should be ONLINE. If any are OFFLINE, investigate why and recover if needed. Monitor BYTES and BLOCKS for growth trends and capacity planning.
analysis_prompt: Check datafile status. Alert if any are OFFLINE. Calculate total storage used. Identify largest datafiles and growth potential.
